name: DeathTrap (itch)
description:
A RogueLike based Puzzler set in a randomly generated dungeon.

4 worlds 5 levels per world.

this is a early jam version of the game it will likely get better the more it develops.

Controls:

  • ArrowKeys: Movement
  • Z/X: Skip menu / enter game

Made for:

  • DosGameJam
  • Easy Jam (8 Bits to Infinity)
  • Cartridge Jam 3 (Dallas Society of Play)
  • 8 Bits to Infinity ~ Weekly Challenge #2

Based on a Cart by: ModernModron
